name: Money Market Savings Account
details: Start saving in a new way A Money Market Savings Account can come in handy for an individual, a corporation or an institution, if you make minimum initial deposit of Rs.500,000/-. The interest rate is higher than a regular savings account, based on the inter-bank call money market rate and is adjusted weekly. Now investors can enjoy these benefits without any limitations. What benefits can we give you? Competitive interest rates revised weekly Improved cash flow management through safe, liquid investment alternatives Unlimited withdrawals
